stories.title: Add animated galaxy canvas background with shooting stars
ac: Canvas element renders behind all content
Stars rotate slowly around center point with flicker/glow effect
Shooting stars appear randomly (1-2% chance per frame)
Shooting stars have gradient trail that fades
Performance: 60fps on modern devices
Canvas resizes on window resize
Stars have varying sizes and opacity for depth
stories.notes: Use pure Canvas API, no libraries. Inspired by GROK starfield. Stars use polar coordinates for circular motion.

stories.title: Implement Framer-style entrance animations with spring physics
ac: Hero elements animate in with staggered delays (badge, h1, subtitle, buttons, code)
Use CSS spring-like cubic-bezier easing (0.16, 1, 0.3, 1)
Elements animate from opacity 0, translateY 60px
Stagger delay: 100ms between elements
Animation duration: 1s per element
Animation only triggers once on page load
stories.notes: Framer uses spring physics. CSS approximation: cubic-bezier(0.16, 1, 0.3, 1) for overshoot effect

stories.title: Add scroll-triggered reveal animations with IntersectionObserver
ac: Workflow cards animate in with staggered delays (100ms each)
Feature cards animate with 50ms stagger
Benchmark section slides in from bottom
CTA section has subtle scale-up animation
Use IntersectionObserver with 10% threshold
rootMargin: -100px to trigger slightly before visible
Elements only animate once (no re-animation on scroll up)
stories.notes: Existing reveal class can be enhanced. Add data-delay attribute for stagger control.

stories.title: Redesign hero section with premium typography and layout
ac: Increase hero h1 to clamp(3.5rem, 10vw, 7rem)
Add gradient text effect on accent word (ships code)
Update badge with animated border gradient
Add subtle parallax effect on hero content (moves slower than scroll)
Improve hero-code block with syntax highlighting colors
Add copy-to-clipboard tooltip feedback
stories.notes: Reference Awwwards typography: large headlines (170px), tight letter-spacing (-0.03em)

stories.title: Add micro-interactions and hover states throughout
ac: Navigation links have underline slide-in animation on hover
Buttons have subtle scale (1.02) and glow on hover
Workflow cards have 3D tilt effect on hover (perspective)
Feature cards have border gradient reveal on hover
Terminal has typing cursor animation
Logo has subtle rotation on hover
All transitions use cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1)
stories.notes: Keep interactions subtle and professional. Don't overdo it.

stories.title: Implement smooth scroll and section transitions
ac: Smooth scroll to anchors with offset for fixed header
Active nav link highlights based on scroll position
Section dividers have animated gradient lines
Page has subtle fade-in on load (prevent FOUC)
Scroll progress indicator in nav or as fixed element
stories.notes: Use scroll-behavior: smooth and IntersectionObserver for active states

stories.title: Enhance color palette with vibrant gradients
ac: Update --accent to vibrant blue-purple gradient
Add animated gradient orbs in background (beyond static glow)
CTA section has animated gradient border
Workflow icons have gradient backgrounds matching their colors
Add subtle noise texture overlay for depth
Gradient animations use CSS hue-rotate or position shift
stories.notes: Awwwards palette: purples (#502BD8), accent oranges (#FA5D29), greens (#AAEEC4)

stories.title: Add responsive mobile menu with animations
ac: Hamburger menu icon animates to X on open
Menu slides in from right or fades in with backdrop blur
Menu links stagger animate in
Body scroll locks when menu is open
Menu closes on link click or outside click
Transition duration: 400ms
stories.notes: Current mobile menu button exists but has no functionality

stories.title: Polish terminal animation with realistic typing effect
ac: Terminal lines type out character by character
Typing speed: ~50ms per character
Blinking cursor follows typing position
Lines appear sequentially (wait for previous to finish)
Terminal activates when scrolled into view
Add subtle screen flicker/scan-line effect (optional)
stories.notes: Creates engagement and draws attention to the benchmark stats

stories.title: Final polish and performance optimization
ac: All animations respect prefers-reduced-motion
Canvas animation pauses when tab not visible
Lazy load any heavy assets
Test on mobile devices for performance
Ensure accessibility: focus states, keyboard navigation
Add meta tags for social sharing (og:image, etc.)
Lighthouse score: Performance 90+, Accessibility 100
